video_prompt: Epic fire column erupts from water into a vibrant night sky. Meteors streak across dynamic, glowing celestial clouds. Reflective water shimmers with the dancing light of the intense flames. Wispy clouds subtly shift.
image_prompt: Animated, vertical, vibrant illustration of a dramatic night sky featuring glowing stars and teal/orange nebulae over water. A towering, fiery orange-to-golden column of flame erupts from a burning island, its light reflecting intensely on the water, contrasting with the dark sky and streaking meteors. Awe-inspiring, powerful, and fantastical.
refined_video_prompt: A colossal fire column erupts from water, blasting upwards into the night. Meteors streak across dynamically shifting celestial clouds, which pulse with light. The water surface shimmers, mirroring the intense, dancing flames. Background clouds subtly drift.
